summary: This is an email chain from October 2021 discussing legal representation for an individual (EFTA00084051) in Epstein-related matters. It involves attorneys Sigrid McCawley and Robert Y. Lewis coordinating on pro bono representation and issues related to the v. Maxwell case and unsealing/protective order matters.

persons.context: Attorney who is helping the individual with v. Maxwell unsealing/protective order issues, as referenced by Sigrid McCawley.

keyFacts: Sigrid McCawley of Boies Schiller Flexner LLP represents an individual (EFTA00084051) pro bono on Epstein-related matters.
Robert Y. Lewis is assisting the same individual on legal issues related to the v. Maxwell case, specifically unsealing and protective order matters.
The email chain shows coordination between attorneys in October 2021 regarding legal representation connected to the Epstein case and the Maxwell prosecution.
The correspondence is marked as confidential and subject to attorney-client privilege, indicating sensitive legal discussions.
